SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.megatome.frame2
Class Globals

java.lang.Object
  org.megatome.frame2.Globals

public final class Globals
extends Object

Defines global data needed by extenders of the framework. These values can be changed by specifying the appropriate name and value as context parameters in the web.xml file for the application.

Field Summary
static String CANCEL
          Value used for indicating a request should be cancelled.
static String CONFIG_FILE
          The path for the Frame2 configuration file.
static String DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE
          The default configuration file: /WEB-INF/frame2-config.xml
static String ERRORS
          The key used to look up the Errors object from the request attributes map.

          Error key for Commons Validator

Field Detail

CONFIG_FILE

public static final String CONFIG_FILE
The path for the Frame2 configuration file. Override the value org.megatome.frame2.CONFIG_FILE to specify a different name for the configuration file.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ERRORS

public static final String ERRORS
The key used to look up the Errors object from the request attributes map.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LOGGER_TYPE

public static final String LOGGER_TYPE
Used to specify what type of logger to use for the Frame2 framework. Override the value org.megatome.frame2.LOGGER_TYPE in web.xml to specify logger settings.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE

public static final String DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE
The default configuration file: /WEB-INF/frame2-config.xml

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FILE_UPLOAD_DIR

public static final String FILE_UPLOAD_DIR
The directory that uploaded files are temporarily placed in. Override the value org.megatome.frame2.FILE_UPLOAD_DIR in web.xml to specify the location uploaded files should be temporarily placed. Defaults to the system temp directory.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAX_FILE_SIZE

public static final String MAX_FILE_SIZE
The maximum file size for uploaded files. Override the value org.megatome.frame2.MAX_FILE_SIZE in web.xml to specify a maximum file size for uploaded files.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FILE_BUFFER_SIZE

public static final String FILE_BUFFER_SIZE
The size of the buffer to be used when uploading files. Override the value org.megatome.frame2.FILE_BUFFER_SIZE in web.xml to specify a buffer size for dealing with uploaded files.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RESOURCE_BUNDLE

public static final String RESOURCE_BUNDLE
The name of the resource bundle to be used by the framework. Override the value org.megatome.frame2.RESOURCE_BUNDLE in web.xml to specify the properties file to be used by the application.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CANCEL

public static final String CANCEL
Value used for indicating a request should be cancelled. Cannot be overridden.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAPPING_KEY_PREFIX

public static final String MAPPING_KEY_PREFIX
Value used when creating mapping errors in the introspector. Cannot be overridden.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FORWARD_SLASH

public static final String FORWARD_SLASH
The forward slash character. Not sure we need this.
